imdb.plot outline: High school sophomore Harold "Hank" Clark is the king of losers, he loves Science, chess, and saves every penny he makes washing dishes at a local restaurant. But Hank has a plan. A three year plan. He's going to be Prom King his senior year, and along the way to be most popular he's going to make the prettiest girl in school all his.
imdb.title: Prom King
plot: High school sophomore Harold "Hank" Clark is the king of losers, he loves Science, chess, and saves every penny he makes washing dishes at a local restaurant. But Hank has a plan. A three year plan. He's going to be _Prom King_ (qv) his senior year, and along the way to be most popular he's going to make the prettiest girl in school all his.::Frank Pestarino
